document_data.name: Towers of Night
document_data.mainbody: The '''Towers of Night''' was the largest [[plane]] in the [[Astral Sea]] as described by the [[World Axis cosmology]] model. The greater goddess [[Shar]] ruled the Towers of Night, with [[Talona]], [[Sseth]], and [[Zehir]] also residing there. It was known as the place where darkness reigned supreme.
document_data.Description: The plane was a dark and terrifying place always benighted with a starless sky. It consisting of wastelands, crags, forests, bogs, black deserts, and dangerous seas and rivers. A number of foreboding citadels dotted the landscape.
document_data.Cosmography: The Towers of Night lay in the silvery void of the Astral Sea{{Cite dragon/378/Domains in Eberron and the Forgotten Realms|38}}
document_data.Notable Locations:
* The [[City of Serpents (divine realm)|City of Serpents]], the location of Sseth's black pyramid within the plane's largest forest, the [[Slithering Jungle]].
* The [[Palace of Loss]], Shar's citadel atop the highest peak in the plane.
* The [[Plague Palace]], Talona's black pyramidal citadel deep within the plane's most dangerous and disease-ridden swamp.
* The [[Sea of Poison]], the location of [[Zehir]]'s many-tunneled domain.
